name: Lost Hope: Backrooms
description:
Lost Hope is a horror game based on the Backroooms universe, where you have to solve puzzles to progress through the story, explore mysterious places filled with strange and incomprehensible things, and the locals won't let you leave the place so easily, if there is any way out at all...

Based On the Backrooms Universe.


Embark on an exciting journey through more than 8+ different levels. In each level, a thrilling story intertwines with challenging puzzles, offering different escape routes fraught with danger at every turn.


Dive into the exciting story, which unfolds in an abandoned laboratory Last Hope inc., where you will play as one character to uncover the story of the other.

Will you be able to reveal all the secrets of this place?


Face more than 5+ entities, each with its own feature and mechanics.
Knowledge of each entity will help you progress through the levels and storyline.

Will you be able to escape this place in one piece?
